document_data.name: Howling Ghost Wood
document_data.mainbody: '''Howling Ghost Wood''' was a forest near the [[Starn (Valley)|Starn Valley]] in the mid–8{{th}} century [[DR]].

Geography.Flora & Fauna: Plants included sources of nuts, berries, and [[alphran]] leaves. There were also [[moontouch]] blooms, fiddleheads, and butter cones in the flora. [[Stag]] were present.{{cite book/Elminster Ascending/The Temptation of Elminster|553|3}}

document_data.Rumors & Legends: Despite the name, [[Immeira]], a local woman of the mid–8{{th}} century, had yet to see a [[ghost]] in the woods, howling or otherwise.
